com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.util

Class WebAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.api.actions.AbstractAction
      • com.xceptance.xlt.api.actions.AbstractWebAction
        • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.util.WebAction

  • public class WebAction
extends com.xceptance.xlt.api.actions.AbstractWebAction
    The WebAction extends the AbstractWebAction of the XLT framework. Therefore, this is the interface to XLT. A WebAction fires a main (web) request, and afterwards an arbitrary amount of Request, Response and AbstractSubrequest. The execution of the main request, etc. can be configured by passing a function to the WebAction.
    Author:
    ckeiner
